related_configuration:
<module name="TreeWalker">
        <module name="CustomImportOrder">
            <property name="sortImportsInGroupAlphabetically" value="true"/>
            <property name="customImportOrderRules" value="STATIC, THIRD_PARTY_PACKAGE"/>
        </module>
    </module>
explanation: Checkstyle reports violations in import group placement first. If an import is placed in the wrong group, it will skip checking the alphabetical order within that group. As a result, incorrect intra-group ordering may go unreported when inter-group misplacement exists.
